mapper.select: SELECT RRV.REP_APPLY_NUM AS REP_APPLY_NUM , RRV.USER_ID AS USER_ID , TO_CHAR(RRV.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , RRV.ACCU_NUM AS ACCU_NUM , TO_CHAR(RB.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE , RRV.REP_RS_NAME AS REP_RS_NAME , RRV.ST_NAME AS ST_NAME , RB.ST_NUM AS ST_NUM , RB.RV_CONTENT AS RV_CONTENT FROM RV_REPORT_VIEW RRV LEFT JOIN RV_BOX RB ON RRV.RV_NUM = RB.RV_NUM WHERE RRV.REP_APPLY_NUM=#{rep_apply_num}

SELECT OAV.OBJ_APPLY_NUM AS OBJ_APPLY_NUM , OAV.REQ_RS AS REQ_RS , OAV.OBJ_RS AS OBJ_RS , OP.PHOTO_LINK AS PHOTO_LINK , OAV.STATE AS STATE FROM OBJ_APPLY_VIEW OAV LEFT JOIN OBJ_PHOTO OP ON OP.OBJ_APPLY_NUM = OAV.OBJ_APPLY_NUM WHERE OAV.OBJ_APPLY_NUM = #{obj_apply_num}

SELECT IA.REG_DATE AS REG_DATE, IA.ST_IN_NUM AS ST_IN_NUM, IA.ST_IN_FILE AS ST_IN_FILE , REGEXP_SUBSTR(IA.ST_IN_FILE, '[^\\]*$') AS IN_FILE_NAME , IA.ST_PLACE_NUM AS ST_PLACE_NUM, IA.ST_PLACE_FILE AS ST_PLACE_FILE , REGEXP_SUBSTR(IA.ST_PLACE_FILE, '[^\\]*$') AS PLACE_FILE_NAME, UU.USER_ID AS USER_ID , IA.ST_NAME AS ST_NAME, IA.ST_LOCATION AS ST_LOCATION, IA.ST_LOCATION_DT AS ST_LOCATION_DT, IA.ST_TEL AS ST_TEL FROM IN_APPLY IA LEFT JOIN USING_USER UU ON IA.USER_NUM = UU.USER_NUM WHERE IN_APPLY_NUM = #{in_apply_num}

SELECT IA.ST_PLACE_NUM AS ST_PLACE_NUM FROM IN_APPLY IA LEFT JOIN IN_PROCESS IP ON IA.IN_APPLY_NUM = IP.IN_APPLY_NUM LEFT JOIN OUT_APPLY OA ON IP.IN_PROCESS_NUM = OA.IN_PROCESS_NUM WHERE OUT_APPLY_NUM = #{out_apply_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REP_PROCESS(REP_PROCESS_NUM, REP_APPLY_NUM, ADMIN_NUM, FINAL_DATE, REP_READ_DATE, ACCU_READ_DATE) VALUES(REPPROSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rep_apply_num}, #{admin_num}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), NULL, NULL)
INSERT INTO REP_MID(REP_MID_NUM, MID_RS, REP_PROCESS_NUM) VALUES(REPMIDSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mid_rs}, #{rep_process_num})
INSERT INTO REP_REJ(REP_REJ_NUM, REJ_RS, REP_PROCESS_NUM) VALUES(REPREJSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rej_rs}, #{rep_process_num})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN RM.REP_MID_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN '중재' WHEN RR.REP_REJ_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN '반려' ELSE '처리중' END AS MID_REJ , RM.MID_RS AS MID_RS , RR.REJ_RS AS REJ_RS FROM RV_REPORT_VIEW RRV LEFT JOIN REP_MID RM ON RRV.REP_PROCESS_NUM = RM.REP_PROCESS_NUM LEFT JOIN REP_REJ RR ON RRV.REP_PROCESS_NUM = RR.REP_PROCESS_NUM WHERE RRV.REP_PROCESS_NUM = #{rep_process_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQ_PROCESS(REQ_PROCESS_NUM, REQ_APPLY_NUM, ADMIN_NUM, FINAL_DATE, USER_READ_DATE, ST_READ_DATE) VALUES(REQPROSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{req_apply_num}, #{admin_num}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL)
INSERT INTO PENALTY(PEN_GRANT_NUM, REQ_PROCESS_NUM, GRANT_DATE, PEN_TYPE_NUM) VALUES(PENSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{req_process_num}, SYSDATE, 1)
INSERT INTO REQ_REJ(REQ_REJ_NUM, REQ_PROCESS_NUM, REJ_RS) VALUES(REQREJSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{req_process_num}, #{rej_rs})
INSERT INTO OBJ_PROCESS(OBJ_PROCESS_NUM, OBJ_APPLY_NUM, FINAL_DATE, ADMIN_NUM) VALUES(OBJPROSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{obj_apply_num}, SYSDATE, #{admin_num})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PENALTY WHERE REQ_PROCESS_NUM = (SELECT OA.REQ_PROCESS_NUM FROM OBJ_PROCESS OP LEFT JOIN OBJ_APPLY OA ON OP.OBJ_APPLY_NUM = OA.OBJ_APPLY_NUM WHERE OP.OBJ_PROCESS_NUM NOT IN (SELECT OBJ_PROCESS_NUM FROM OBJ_REJ) AND OP.OBJ_PROCESS_NUM = #{obj_process_num})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OBJ_REJ(OBJ_REJ_NUM, REJ_RS, OBJ_PROCESS_NUM) VALUES(OBJREJSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rej_rs}, #{obj_process_num})
INSERT INTO APPLY_REVERSE(APPLY_REVERSE_NUM, REVERSE_RS, OBJ_PROCESS_NUM) VALUES(REVERSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{reverse_rs}, #{obj_process_num})
INSERT INTO REVO_PROCESS(REVO_PROCESS_NUM, REVO_APPLY_NUM, FINAL_DATE, ADMIN_NUM) VALUES(REVORPOSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{revo_apply_num}, SYSDATE, #{admin_num})
INSERT INTO REVO_REJ(REVO_REJ_NUM, REJ_RS, REVO_PROCESS_NUM) VALUES(REVOREJSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rej_rs}, #{revo_process_num})
INSERT INTO IN_PROCESS(IN_PROCESS_NUM, IN_APPLY_NUM, ADMIN_NUM, FINAL_DATE) VALUES(INPROSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{in_apply_num}, #{admin_num}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO ST_LIST(ST_NUM, IN_PROCESS_NUM, REGION_NUM) VALUES(STLISTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{in_process_num}, 1)
INSERT INTO IN_REJ(IN_REJ, REJ_RS, IN_PROCESS_NUM) VALUES(INREJSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rej_rs}, #{in_process_num})
INSERT INTO OUT_PROCESS(OUT_PROCESS_NUM, OUT_APPLY_NUM, ADMIN_NUM, FINAL_DATE) VALUES(OUTPROSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{out_apply_num}, #{admin_num}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO OUT_REJ(OUT_REJ_NUM, REJ_RS, OUT_PROCESS_NUM) VALUES(OUTREJSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rej_rs}, #{out_process_num})
